page.title: 20TRANSPORT
page.content:
ROADS - THE B4449 PASSES THROUGH THE AREA, WITH A FEW MINOR COUNTRY LANES LEAVING THE MAIN ROAD

BUSES - THERE IS ONE SERVICE TO OXFORD WHICH RUNS HOURLY MONDAY TO SATURDAY. THE FIRST BUS OF THE DAY LEAVES THE VILLAGE AT 7.30PM AND THE LAST ARRIVES BACK AROUND 6.30PM

THESE BUSES ARE PART OF THE RURAL WEST OXFORDSHIRE SERVICE AND GOES THROUGH MANY VILLAGES ON THEIR ROUTE
